EmailTemplate.name: 06_26_15 Virtual & Cloud Paradigms WP Send.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}}, Challenge The Virtual Status Quo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/resources/challenging-traditional-virtual-cloud-paradigms?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=paradigmwp&utm_content=06262015> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
For most organizations, business success is a direct function of IT success. In the past traditional IT architectures have been based on silos with computing resources dedicated to specific applications, as well as over-provisioning to accommodate peak demands and potential future growth. Virtualized systems have since replaced these silos with a layer of shared resources. However, virtualization also brings a new set of challenges for the data center. Virtual and cloud environments are dynamic and become infinitely more complex as they scale. Download Challenging Traditional Virtual & Cloud Paradigms <http://vmturbo.com/resources/challenging-traditional-virtual-cloud-paradigms?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=paradigmwp&utm_content=06262015> and learn about:
- Virtualizationâ€™s transformative impact on the data center and the challenges it creates. - A new approach to data center management: the economic abstraction of virtual and cloud environments, which enables software to address both the complexity and scale that today challenges application performance.
- The VMTurbo Team <http://vmturbo.com/resources/challenging-traditional-virtual-cloud-paradigms?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=paradigmwp&utm_content=06262015>
